name: Irredenta: Under Grotto Hollow
description: Irredenta is a 2D Multiplayer Online Battle Arena video game played on PC. The game uses pixel art as its visual style. The game consists of two teams that have four players on each team. Each team works together to control parts of the map and take down the enemy base. The game consists of three lanes where the players fight towers and the opposing teams using unique abilities. There are paths connecting the three main lanes where players can do side activities to earn currency and experience points.
